# Walue of water withdrawals

Analyst can differentiate withdrawls into residential, agricultural, thermoelectric, industrial uses.

## Data requirements/sources
Value of water provided to public based on municipality cost data; value of water for irrigation from sources such as [USDA NASS](https://www.nass.usda.gov/Charts_and_Maps/Agricultural_Prices/index.php)
